author: stsp
msg: On the tree-conflicts branch, remove two unused and unimplemented functions.

author: stsp
msg: On the tree-conflicts branch, make XML output of 'svn status'
Also, remove the -t flag we added to 'svn status', which caused
human-readable tree conflict descriptions to be printed.
This functionality will go into svn info instead because
a) svn status is usually very concise. It produces mostly single
letter status codes. The -t option produced rather verbose output.
svn info already prints long single-line fields, so adding one
multi-line field here is a bit less of a crime...
b) Putting this functionality into svn info requires much less changes,
decreasing the size of the diff between trunk and the tree-conflicts
branch by a few dozen lines.
svn info will be updated in a separate commit.
Don't print human readable tree conflict descriptions anymore.
wc-status element for a directory with tree conflicts.
Track removal of argument of print_status.
(svn_cl__print_status): Track removal of argument of svn_cl__print_status.
(svn_cl__status): Track removal of show_tree_conflicts member of status_baton.
